籤詩版本二:
Yana da matukar wahala a yi ƙoƙari don samun nasara, amma kwanakin yaƙi don aure na ɗan lokaci ne.
A ƙarshe kuma za a buga masa kibiya, mai daraja yana jagorantar mutane masu daraja.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar albarka a ɓoye.
Komai yana da kyau.
解曰: Canjin ganganci. Enron a karshen. Idan ka yi tambaya game da amfani. Kusa da mutane masu daraja kawai.
籤詩故事一:
Shawarar littafi Jiang Wei (Shawarar Littafin Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), mai suna Boyue, ɗan asalin gundumar Ji ne, gundumar Tianshui, Liangzhou (yanzu gundumar Gangu, birnin Tianshui, lardin Gansu).
A lokacin daular Uku, Kong Ming ya jagoranci dakarunsa daga tsaunin Qishan har sau shida don kai wa Cao Wei hari. Kong Ming yana fama da rashin lafiya sosai kuma yana cikin mawuyacin hali. Ya koyar da surori ashirin da hudu na littafin yaki ga janar Jiang Wei, yana fatan ya gaji gadonsa.
(Misali na wannan labarin shine cewa an gaji Jiang Wei saboda wasu dalilai)
聖意: Gidan yana da kyau, ina tafiya lafiya, ina neman arziki, ina yin aure, mai tafiya a kasa na namiji ba ya nan, tsummoki na siliki yana Zhongping, dabbobi shida suna Zhongping, ina neman wani, shari'ar ta dace. , Ina yin hijira, ina wadata, ina da wadata, ina fama da cututtuka na Gabas, na yi sa'a a cikin kabari na Xingxing.
古人: Shawarwari na Littafi ga Jiang Wei (Littattafai zuwa Jiang Wei)
第X籤: Sa hannu a kan sha ɗaya
